alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 26 at 5:41AM MDT until March 27 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT MONDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 6 AM MDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches in northern Johnson County, up to 2 inches in southern Johnson County. * WHERE...Johnson County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Monday, the most numerous snow showers will occur in the afternoon and evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Due to the showery and banded nature of the snow, amounts may vary over short distances.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
